name: seismically
content:
Add to word list

geology
  specialized in a way that relates to or involves an earthquake: Japan is one of the world's most seismically active areas.
in a way that has a very great or important effect: It was a war that seismically changed the course of history. The debate has shifted seismically. See
seismic
More examplesFewer examplesThe list of seismically monitored volcanoes has increased from four to 23. The long and narrow stone building has never been open to public tours, mainly because it is seismically unsafe. In 1993, there were about 20 earthquakes that occurred between March and November, and so that area is active seismically.Most of Antarctica is seismically stable. Pallets have seismically altered the economics of global shipping.
